title: Short-Intensive Instructional Design Course Utilizing AI-Based Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design theory (ADDIE model) and foundational data analysis skills
context.additional_context: Short-term program for professionals in medical/legal/technical sectors to integrate AI-driven learning analytics into instructional design via mobile devices

learning_goals: Learners can apply AI-based learning analytics to each phase of the ADDIE model (Analysis, Design, Development, Implementation, Evaluation).
Learners can design personalized microlearning content by collecting and analyzing learning data.
Learners can establish formative assessment-centered instructional design strategies in mobile environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
